name: Spicy Mushroom Larb
ingredients: 1/2 head – green cabbage, halved crosswise and leaves separated
instructions: optionally, start rice if this is being served on rice
Crush/chop peanuts into small pieces, set aside
heat oil in pan over medium-high until shimmering
Add mushrooms and cook undisturbed until bottom sides are brown, ~5 minutes
If using chicken, add chicken slices at this point
Toss and continue to cook, tossing occasionally and reducing heat as needed to avoid burning until golden all over, ~4 minutes
add scallions, garlic, ginger and cook until softened and fragrant, ~2 minutes
Remove from heat, lightly season with salt
Mix in shallot, chile, mint, fish sauce, and half of peanuts.

additional_context.tips: Do not even think about stirring, tossing, or shaking mushrooms while cooking to get the best browning!
